channel.title: Sad rejects!
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape world, I think that your all a bunch of sad rejects who can't get no friends and who are going to live with your mum for the rest of your life! I posted a comment on here yesterday and I was getting call the N words :confused: :confused: whats that all about how the hell can a ginger person be called that am far from dark skinned!. And my post was removed for braking a rule! How can you say am braking rules your all braking copy right you sad rejects. You all need to get a life.
[b]PEACE![/b] :cool:
